stories.text: If talent had verifiable skills/employment history/work history AND it'd reduce the time to hire, would you hire on web3 over web2? If you could note what industry you're in and what types of roles you'd be open to hiring/have had issues hiring, that'd be AMAZING.
stories.title: Would you hire talent on web3?
Experimental Pfizer Pill Prevents Covid Hospitalizations and Deaths

stories.text:
Hi HN, I'm Alex, CEO and co-founder of Showdrop. We're building an entirely new way for brands to reach consumers in real life, by building a platform that connects brands with local brick-and-mortar businesses looking to rent out excess space.

We just raised a pre-seed round from a stellar group of VCs and angels, and we’re seeking a product-driven entrepreneurial software engineer to join the Showdrop team as our hands-on Founding Engineer.

The Founding Engineer will be responsible for building the Showdrop platform, defining the engineering culture and leading a high-quality engineering team.

This is a ground-floor role at a startup backed by top VCs, with an amazing team who together share this rare opportunity to reinvent the future of IRL retail.

Responsibilities will include:

- Be a thinking partner to the Showdrop leadership team, including actively participating in roadmapping and architecture discussions

- Manage all tech development, including in-house and outsourced software development and data engineering

- Produce high-quality, production-ready, readable, maintainable code

- Lead large projects from initial inception to production

- Hire, manage, mentor, & grow the Showdrop engineering team

In terms of what we're looking for, you're ideally someone who:

- Codes and wants to code

- Likes to move quickly and ship to customers

- Has 4+ years experience with Ruby on Rails or Django

- Can work across the stack — infrastructure, database, backend, frontend

- Has experience building, deploying and supporting software in production

What you get:

- Competitive salary - Meaningful equity in Showdrop - Medical/dental/vision insurance - 401K - Shared office space in Chicago with free coffee/snacks and awesome views of the city - The opportunity to be a core early member of the Showdrop team (first 5 employees) that shapes and implements our vision for a new model of IRL product discovery and sampling

If this sounds interesting, please reach out to me at alex [at] showdrop [dot] com, with your resume/LinkedIn, a few lines on why the opportunity appeals to you, and any other relevant information.

Thanks! Alex
stories.title: Showdrop is hiring Founding Engineer
